list.name: Default
list.comment:
First official release of the website.
Only change from the last one was that I removed the outline from the portfolio images.

changelist.name: Default
changelist.comment: Added a modal view for each of the images in the 'portfolio' section. Now, when the images are clicked on, a modal will appear giving more information about what I did with each job and a small showcase of what I did for them as well. There is a graphical bug with the images on index.html where there is an approximately 10px tall white space between the bottom of the image and the border. Not sure why this is happening but was worse when the links were <button> vs <a>. I will have to investigate this further later.

task.summary: Added a modal view for each of the images in the 'portfolio' section. Now, when the images are clicked on, a modal will appear giving more information about what I did with each job and a small showcase of what I did for them as well. There is a graphical bug with the images on index.html where there is an approximately 10px tall white space between the bottom of the image and the border. Not sure why this is happening but was worse when the links were <button> vs <a>. I will have to investigate this further later.

Not sure why this is happening but was worse when the links were <button> vs <a>. I will have to investigate this further later.

Not sure why this is happening but was worse when the links were <button> vs <a>. I will have to investigate this further later.

Added a modal view for each of the images in the 'portfolio' section. Now, when the images are clicked on, a modal will appear giving more information about what I did with each job and a small showcase of what I did for them as well. There is a graphical bug with the images on index.html where there is an approximately 10px tall white space between the bottom of the image and the border. Not sure why this is happening but was worse when the links were <button> vs <a>. I will have to investigate this further later.
Release Commit. Fixed blank underneath portfolio images, removed border around portfolio images. Removed unnecessary CSS code (commented out) and removed unused JavaScript files.
Release Commit. Fixed blank underneath portfolio images, removed border around portfolio images. Removed unnecessary CSS code (commented out) and removed unused JavaScript files.
Release Commit. Fixed blank underneath portfolio images, removed border around portfolio images. Removed unnecessary CSS code (commented out) and removed unused JavaScript files.

First official release of the website.
Only change from the last one was that I removed the outline from the portfolio images.

MESSAGE.value: Organized and Cleaned up main files. Put all sections on index.html

Added smooth scrolling to the 'About Me' section.
This is the first time that I touched this code in probably a month or more. In that time, I haven't noticed anything bad with the code or the look that needs to change. In fact, I've found that people rather like the little animations when hovering over divs.
The navbar is still not cooperating properly. It should stay at the top of the view no matter what since I'm using 'navbar-fixed-top' but for some reason, it is staying at the top of the page instead as if I never implemented that code. I believe that it works as intended on Mac though, which is strange. I'll have to look into that later.
This will be the last commit before I redesign the file hierarchy for the project to make it easier to navigate, as well as duplicate within the same git branch. Also, I will be implementing Bower. I'm still not sure if I agree with having the files local as they are not cached and will make the site load slower (at least initially), but I also don't want to risk my site going down because of some cdn being unavailable or insecure (i.e. the HTTPS certificate is expired or something). Maybe use CDN by default then load Bower files if needed? This is something I should look into later.

Changed the font to Open Sans on all systems. Also, I added more comments around the anti-aliasing code in the CSS main file to better explain why it's there. After conceding that having something along the lines of eight different fonts that the browser could use (at least one of which should have been on the local system), it came to my attention that no two browsers could replicate the same look if they were rendering fonts differently (or, in the case of Safari vs Chrome on Mac, different fonts altogether(San Francisco vs Helvetica Neue)), thus, I decided to go with a single font for the website, no matter what browser/os the user was on. After weighing my options, I went with Open Sans (for now at least) as it seems to be a fairly common font, is easy to read, and is Google APIs hosted. Also, for some reason, Intellij IDEA believes that the source for the font (fonts.googleapis.com) is not a valid URI, I'll have to check on that later (added a TODO for this)

Bower support didn't workout as I had planned. It was simply too complicated and for a small project like this, I think i'll be fine publishing it with CDN. Also updated Bootstrap CSS to version 3.3.6, and added the new integrity and corssorigin attributes to Bootstrap JS.
Mostly miscellaneous code cleanup and organization. Tried to fix the navbar-fixed-top bug but to no avail. Got images to stop 'twitching' when hovering over them in Chrome.
Tried even MORE things to fix the stupid navbar bug but nothing worked! I'm giving up for now because I have to pack my computer away to go home. Will try again later.
Restored the round buttons in master branch.
Updated the navbar to be larger, as well as a slight redesign. Also started adding the links for 'My Portfolio.'
Did more for the 'My Portfolio' section of the page. Added a caption that disappears when hovered over and more.
Finished (?) the 'My Portfolio' section of the page without adding any background images.
Added more information to the 'About Me' section.
Added images to the portfolio section.
Added the portfolio images to the git
Fixed jquery autoscrolling too far and made the section-headers smaller
Added icons to the 'Languages I Know' section of About Me.
Added the icons for 'Languages I Know' to the git
Added the icons for 'Languages I Know' to the git.

Started adding in the contact me section. Creating an email form is harder than I thought. With the other website, I just used a 3rd party plugin, but with this, I want it all to be integrated, so I'm trying to do it myself. I believe that I'm nearly there, but that I still need the environmental variables for the sendmail.php file. Will need to do that in the future.

Changed the top logo to contain my name in the SVG instead of as a separate entity on the website. This should fix some minor layout issues with the text when moving from a phone sized window to a larger window.
Reorganized the portfolio section and the languages section as well as added dummy text to the 'Hello!' section.
Added a modal to the portfolio images that activates when clicked on. A button element is used but some CSS may be needed to fix the look of the buttons.

Added a modal view for each of the images in the 'portfolio' section. Now, when the images are clicked on, a modal will appear giving more information about what I did with each job and a small showcase of what I did for them as well. There is a graphical bug with the images on index.html where there is an approximately 10px tall white space between the bottom of the image and the border. Not sure why this is happening but was worse when the links were <button> vs <a>. I will have to investigate this further later.
Release Commit. Fixed blank underneath portfolio images, removed border around portfolio images. Removed unnecessary CSS code (commented out) and removed unused JavaScript files.
Added Favicon

First official release of the website.
Only change from the last one was that I removed the outline from the portfolio images.
